name: Tower of Ascension (itch)
description:
Tower of Ascension

This is the Introductory Project for VGDC. In Tower of Ascension, play as a rebel gunner trying to escape a tower controlled by the evil robot army, and reach the arena at the top to conquer the robot overlords!

Controls:

WASD for movement.

SPACEBAR for jumping and jetpack control.

Left Click for firing and charging attacks.

Right Click for aiming.

TAB for Pausing.
